title: Teleport (mutation)
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1"
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
|Rank||Effect||Flavor
|-
|1||You are sometimes teleported next to a monster. ||You are occasionally teleported next to monsters.
|-
|2||More frequent teleportation.||You are often teleported next to monsters.
|- 
| colspan="3" |
'''Species Notes:''' [[Formicid]]s can not teleport and thus can not get this mutation.
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
| colspan="3" |
[[Bad mutations|Bad mutation]]
|}
[[Category:Mutations]] [[Category:Bad Mutations]]
<noinclude>
==History==
*Prior to [[0.29]], it was a 3 rank mutation.</noinclude>
